wikipedia_page.main: Bayle Frederick St. John (1822–1 August 1859) was a British travel writer and biographer, one of the four sons of James Augustus St. John, who went on to become journalists and authors of some literary distinction.

response: Vane Ireton Shaftesbury St John was born in Hampstead, London, the son of journalist, author and traveller James Augustus St. John and his wife, Eliza Hansard. He was the youngest brother of diplomat Spenser St. John, journalist Bayle St. John and travel writer Percy Bolingbroke St. John. He worked as a clerk for the Inland Revenue before taking up writing full time.Robert J. Kirkpatrick, From the Penny Dreadful to the Ha'Penny Dreadfuller (London: 2013), p. 24.
